mapper.insert:
insert into audit (user_id, obj_id, obj_name, action_date, action, before_action, after_action, client_ip, req_uuid, req_url, req_success, req_exp, req_method, req_elapse, req_param, req_result) values
(#{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.objName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.actionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.action,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.beforeAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.afterAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqSuccess,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.reqExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqElapse,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.reqParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
